file_content.text: Glittering atop one of Coruscant's highest city-spires, this luxurious penthouse apartment is located at the heart of the prestigious Senate District. It features elegant traditional Republic architecture, roomy interiors, and a view of the city skyline to rival any on Coruscant. Discreet but robust security features ensure that only the owner's chosen guests can gain access.
The garage is an expansive room with many large decoration layouts. Although it's suitable for the storage of vehicles and machinery, it can easily be repurposed into a more refined social space.
The East Stairway includes seven pedestals for decorations, space for wall-hangings, and a small room at the summit which connects to the Balcony and the Main Room.
The West Stairway includes seven pedestals for decorations, space for wall-hangings, and a small room at the summit which connects to the Balcony and the Main Room.
Unlocking the Balcony permits you to enjoy the fresh air of Coruscant's high atmosphere unfettered by safety protocols. It includes a variety of hooks and an excellent view.
The Main Room links the two stairways and provides access to the upper floor Living Quarters. It contains a variety of hooks and includes a large bay window with an incredible view.
The Living Quarters provides access to three additional small rooms, each of which has an excellent view of the Senate District. It also provides a variety of decoration hooks.
This small room contains a variety of decoration hooks and a window overlooking the cityscape.
This small room contains a variety of decoration hooks and a window overlooking the cityscape.
This small room contains a variety of decoration hooks and a window overlooking the cityscape.

A Dromund Kaas apartment without equal, this monolithic symbol of personal power and wealth towers above the most elite quadrant of Kaas City. Constructed of the finest materials in a bold, imposing style, this apartment has a commanding view of the Imperial Citadel, and includes an impenetrable security system to deter any unwelcome visitors or determined rivals.
The garage is an expansive room with many large decoration layouts. Although it's suitable for the storage of vehicles and machinery, it can easily be repurposed into a more refined social space.
The East Stairway includes eight pedestals for decorations, space for wall-hangings, and a small room at the summit which connects to the Balcony and the Main Room.
The West Stairway includes eight pedestals for decorations, space for wall-hangings, and a small room at the summit which connects to the Balcony and the Main Room.
Unlocking the Balcony permits you to survey the surrounding area in Kaas City for maximum visibility and control of your compound. It includes a variety of hooks and an excellent view.
The Main Room links the two stairways and provides access to the upper floor Living Quarters. It contains a variety of hooks and includes a large bay window with an incredible view.
The Living Quarters provides access to three additional small rooms, each of which has an excellent view of Kaas City. It also provides a variety of decoration hooks.
This small room contains a variety of decoration hooks and a window overlooking the cityscape.
This small room contains a variety of decoration hooks and a window overlooking the cityscape.
This small room contains a variety of decoration hooks and a window overlooking the cityscape.

Although its name suggests towering spires and ramparts, a Sky Palace is most distinguished by its incredible opulence. With luxurious accommodations, a stunning view, and state-of-the-art security system, this atmospheric apartment out-classes even the most decadent hotels in the galaxy. Owning a Sky Palace is a mark of true distinction on the Smuggler's Moon, where only the most affluent can afford lodgings with a view of the city skyline.
The ultimate room for demonstrating the unparalleled opulence of the Sky Palace, the Solarium features a large space with three miniature balconies looking out over the city skyline.
This stairway features fifteen pedestals for ornamentation as well as wall space for banners or artwork. It includes a small room at the base connecting to the Balcony and Main Room expansions.
This stairway features fifteen pedestals for ornamentation as well as wall space for banners or artwork. It includes a small room at the base connecting to the Balcony and Main Room expansions.
The Balcony features an expansive view of the city skyline and includes a variety of large hook layouts. Most impressively, it accomodates three full centerpieces outside the Main Room window.
The main room offers a variety of standard hook layouts as well as a view out over the balcony. It also provides access to the door to the lower levels of the stronghold.
This room offers a standard set of hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. It includes a window looking out over the cityscape.
This room offers a standard set of hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. It includes a window looking out over the cityscape.
The Vestibule is a medium-sized room featuring an overlook of the Main Room, many large layouts, and access to the two Stairway expansions which lead to the lower levels of the stronghold.
The Antechamber is an ideal social lounge, situated in a high-traffic area between the Main Room and the massive Solarium expansion. It features a variety of large hooks.

Get away from it all with this expansive homestead on the remote and scenic world of Tatooine. Located at the edge of the vast Dune Sea, features include wide-open exterior spaces, multiple outbuildings constructed in authentic local style, and a secure overlook built into the adjacent cliffside. And with only the latest in security technologies, attacks by marauding Sand People are a thing of the past!

This docking bay offers access to a massive hook layout suitable for starships, in addition to a large number of wall and floor hooks around its perimeter. The high walls offer some protection from sandstorms and roaming predators.
This room offers a set of standard hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. The reinforced desh alloy door provides protection during sandstorms.
This room offers a set of standard hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. The reinforced desh alloy door provides protection during sandstorms.
This room offers a set of standard hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. The reinforced desh alloy door provides protection during sandstorms.
This room offers a set of standard hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. The reinforced desh alloy door provides protection during sandstorms.
This room offers a set of standard hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. The reinforced desh alloy door provides protection during sandstorms.
This room offers a set of standard hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. The reinforced desh alloy door provides protection during sandstorms.

One of the deadliest products of Imperial ingenuity, Harrower-class dreadnaughts have become a symbol of the Empire's power throughout the galaxy. Bristling with heavy weaponry and protected by both powerful shields and thick armor plating, these ships excel in offensive and defensive operations alike, making them the first-choice flagship for Imperial battle groups.
This large room is the central hub of the Command Deck, with a variety of decoration hooks including a centerpiece. It connects to three additional Command Room expansions.
This large room is ideal for strategic operations and oversight, but it could also be customized into a relaxed social space. It includes windows looking out into space.
This large room is ideal for strategic operations and oversight, but it could also be customized into a relaxed social space. It includes windows looking out into space.
This medium-sized room is ideal for strategic operations and oversight, but it could also be customized into a relaxed social space. It includes windows looking out into space.
This network of hallways is the central hub of the Crew Deck, with a common area shared by all of the crew quarters. It connects to six additional Crew Room expansions.
This medium-sized room contains a variety of hooks and could be put to just about any purpose.
This medium-sized room contains a variety of hooks and could be put to just about any purpose.
This medium-sized room contains a variety of hooks and could be put to just about any purpose.
This medium-sized room contains a variety of hooks and could be put to just about any purpose.
This medium-sized room contains a variety of hooks and could be put to just about any purpose.
This medium-sized room contains a variety of hooks and could be put to just about any purpose.
This network of hallways is the central hub of the Hangar Deck. It connects to the two main Hangar expansions.
This expansive starship hangar contains a large variety of decoration hooks including a massive hook for starships and centerpieces.
This expansive starship hangar contains a large variety of decoration hooks including a massive hook for starships and centerpieces.
This medium-sized room is ideal for storing dangerous technology or high-powered devices. It includes a window overlooking the ship's fusion core.

The most powerful warship in Republic service, Valor-class cruisers are larger and more heavily armed than any other ships in the fleet. They also boast numerous hangars, redundant defensive systems, and advanced sensor and communications arrays, making them ideal for service as flagships and other mobile command roles.
This large room is the central hub of the Command Deck, with a variety of decoration hooks including a centerpiece. It connects to three additional Command Room expansions.
This large room is ideal for strategic operations and oversight, but it could also be customized into a relaxed social space. It includes windows looking out into space.

Lost for centuries under the towering treetops of Yavin 4, this temple is the perfect retreat far, far away from the troubles of the Galaxy.

The Main Room links the two deepwater sanctuaries. It contains a variety of hooks and comes equipped with a splendid view of the local aquatic life and the upper deck offering views over your stronghold.
This room offers a standard set of hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. It includes a window looking out over the sea floor.
This room offers a standard set of hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. It includes a window looking out over the sea floor.
This room offers a standard set of hook layouts that could be put to just about any use. It includes a window looking out across the sea.

After years of isolation, Manaan has finally opened its doors to outsiders with this secluded villa on the water. With expansive ocean views and state-of-the-art Selkath defenses, you can rest easy knowing your enemies are parsecs away. Relax on your rooftop garden to take in the fresh sea breeze, or retreat to your underwater den to watch firaxan sharks swim beneath your feet.

Keep your enemies guessing with this stylish mobile defense base nestled within the walls of an Umbaran supply train. Enjoy the security of blast-proof barriers deep within the train's interior, or climb above-deck to watch the Umbaran scenery as you sail through the sky. With a convenient taxi to whisk you between cars, speed and mobility will be the least of your worries.
This cart opens up a large number of wall and floor hooks. Includes exceptional spaces in the inside and outof the cart.
Jump the gap and observe the advanced control center of the Train. Includes a customizable cockpit and fast travel access via speeder to the front and back of your mobile home.
This is a cool place. Lets build!

Escape the daily grind of galactic life by traveling to your own personal slice of paradise. This remote hideout on Rishi was once home to an infamous pirate crew--but not to worry! The property has been cleared of its sordid occupants by a heroic group of adventurers, and subsequently refurbished to include multiple customizable structures, a battle arena, and its own private beach!
The Sky Deck is a large area featuring unique views among the clouds. It comes equipped with many large hook layouts and the option to house up to 4 Starships.

The Cove Expansion opens the grounds, giving access to the mercenary dueling ring and allows access to the Sun and Hillside rooms. It contains a variety of hooks and comes with a wonderful view of the local area.
The Sunroom is perfect room to unwind in. It features a variety of large hooks.
The Hillside Room features a variety of large hooks.
Become the captain of your own patrol carrier. The Carrier unlock connects the main deck with the crew quarters, bridge and skydeck.
This highly technical room comes equipped with many large hooks suitable for storage of your most precious decorations.
The Bridge is the focal point of the Sky Carriers main deck. It features a scenic view of the surrounding area and offers a wide variety of hook types.
The Training Room comes equiped with several hook size. In addition the room allows for multiple training dummies to test your combat prowess.
These quarters come equiped with a variety of hook types so that you can make yourself at home.
These quarters come equiped with a variety of hook types so that you can make yourself at home.
These quarters come equiped with a variety of hook types so that you can make yourself at home.
The Overlook is a premium living space located above the beach. This room comes equiped with hooks of all sizes and a view that can't be beat.
